name: ng-semantic
description: Angular2 building blocks based on Semantic UI

scripts.build: rm -rf demo/app && tsc -p './src' --rootDir './src' --outDir './demo' && tslint -c tslint.json 'src/app/**/*.ts' && cd src && find . -name '*.html' | cpio -pdm ../demo && npm run copy
scripts.copy: tsc && rm -rf demo/vendor/ng-semantic/* && cp -f semantic.js demo/vendor/ng-semantic && cp -f semantic.d.ts demo/vendor/ng-semantic && cp -rfp ng-semantic demo/vendor/ng-semantic

author: Vlado Tešanović
